description: When it comes to dessert, 1 layer sometimes just isn't enough. This vegan 7 layer dessert lasagna is layer upon layer of complete and utter indulgence.
keywords: chocolate caramel dessert, dessert lasagna, vegan dessert
name: Vegan 7-Layer Dessert Lasagna
recipeIngredient: Perfect Vegan Caramel Date Sweetened Brownies (or to make it really fast use box brownies, I won't judge!)
2 containers vegan whipped topping (or make your own like in this recipe) (, 9 ounces each (I use the So Delicious Cocowhip)
Salted Peanut Butter Caramel (, see recipe below)
25 peanut butter sandwich cookies (, gluten free if needed (I love the ones by Back to Nature)
1 cup chocolate chips (I love the ones by Enjoy Life)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the brownies, but spread the batter in a 9 x 13 pan so that they are a thin layer. Cook them for only 12- 15 minutes, you want them a tad on the soft side. Then allow to cool completely, you don't want them warm at all.
To make the caramel, put all the ingredients in a bowl and whip quickly with a fork until everything is smooth.
